short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free tool providing information about any Unicode character.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UnicodePlus is a free tool providing information about any Unicode character, such as its name, its codepoint, or its classification (plane, block, script, etc.).

-----------------------------------------------------------------

How to use UnicodePlus?

Just search for any Unicode character either by typing it directly in the search field (Î£ for example), or its codepoint (U+03A3), name (Greek Capital Letter Sigma), and HTML code (Σ | Σ | Σ). 

UnicodePlus will then:
- Display the basic properties of Î£ (name, block, version, codepoint).

- Check the bidirectional data of Î£ (Left to Right).

- Check the character case of Î£ and find its lowercase/uppercase counterpart (Ïƒ -> U+03C3).

- Convert Î£ to HTML, CSS, Javascript, Python.

- Find any related character (ğšº, ğ¨, ğ¢, ğ›´)

- Preview Î£ in different font styles (Sans, Serif, Monospace).
